src:
【獨家】男人婆變小女人 　AMOi AMOi少琦陷熱戀
02 Nov 2019, 01:58 by 陳于嬙
大馬鬼才黃明志推出的百萬女團AMOi AMOi，陸續傳出新戀情，繼May吳翠媚之後，曾長鬍子的男人婆少琦也脫單，在IG上狂曬與新男友池煒城(Joshua)出遊照，她大方說：「這是第一次帶男朋友跟家人一起去旅遊，當然要以結婚為前提才敢這麼做，不然交往又不結婚，好像很浪費時間。」
黃明志一手打造的網路女神，近期紛紛傳出新戀情，本刊曾拍到四葉草朱主愛與男團「SpeXial」林子閎相戀，兩人隨後也大方認愛；改回本名「何戀慈」的何念兹，也被拍到和《大學生了沒》班底陳希騰(史丹)一同上健身房，同款情侶鞋洩了兩人情愫；而AMOi AMOi的May，也認愛台灣大肌肉猛男，女神們紛紛死會。


少琦與池煒城(Joshua)交往近一年，是彼此為未來另一半。（摘自少琦IG）

如今，AMOi AMOi女團的少琦也傳戀曲，與擔任電影製作兼Youtuber的池煒城(Joshua)相戀，少琦表示，公司跟老闆黃明志沒有「禁愛令」，加上粉絲們都很開放，都希望看到偶像也有幸福的時刻，因此，才決定公開戀情，她表示，兩人交往將近一年，往後餘生都是他了。
有了愛情的滋潤，向來是男人婆的少琦轉變成愛撒嬌的小女人，她甜滋滋說：「我也不知道原因，但可能是愛情的滋潤吧。」
更新時間｜2019.11.01 11:37
text:
[Exclusive] man and woman become a small woman AMOi AMOi Shaoqi is in love
02 Nov 2019, 01:58 by Chen Yuxi
The AMOi AMOi, a million-dollar group launched by the Malaysian ghost, Huang Mingzhi, has successively sent out a new love. After May Wu Cuimei, the man with a long beard, Bai Shaoqi also took off, and mad at the IG with his new boyfriend, Chishua (Joshua). Traveling photos, she said generously: "This is the first time to bring a boyfriend to travel with my family. Of course, we must dare to do this on the premise of marriage. Otherwise, it is a waste of time."
The online goddess created by Huang Mingzhi has recently sent out new love. The magazine once photographed the four-leaf Zhuzhu love and the male group "SpeXial" Lin Zikai. The two later also generously recognized the love; changed back to the real name "He Lianci He Nianzi, who was also photographed together with Chen Xiteng (Stan), who was under the class of "College Students", went to the gym with the same couple's shoes. The May of AMOi AMOi also loved Taiwan's big muscles. The goddesses died.


Shaoqi and Joshua have been in contact for nearly a year, and they are each other for the future. (taken from Shaoqi IG)

Today, Shaoqi, AMOi AMOi women's group, also loves songs, and is in love with Joshua, who is a filmmaker and Youtuber. Shaoqi said that the company and its boss Huang Mingzhi have no "forbidden love", plus fans. They are very open, and they all want to see idols and happy moments. Therefore, they decided to open their love. She said that they have been in contact for nearly a year, and they are all for the rest of their lives.
With the nourishment of love, Shaoqi, who has always been a man’s wife, turned into a little woman who loves to be spoiled. She said with sweetness: "I don’t know why, but it may be the nourishment of love."
Update time |2019.11.01 11:37
